transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: hey nicholas nice to see you today your pcp looks like he sent you over for a nonhealing foot ulcer on your right foot can you tell me about how long you've had that

transcript.transcript: yeah it was it was stinging initially like i had just done something small but at this point it's it's really like throbbing it's almost like there is a fire poker in the bottom of my foot now and then the inside of my calf muscle is really hard and i've noticed that every time that i push that i feel it all the way up to my knee behind my kneecap and then noticed that i've been coughing a lot the last two days and then i've noticed that i've had like difficult time catching my breath when i'm walking around the house and so it's almost like two different things going on at this point

transcript.transcript: okay

transcript.transcript: Saying that, we don't know whether these are the beginning stage.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: So that's why I'd rather, but I would rather you see a GP as soon as possible, if uh, we've got a slot available.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: But if not, I think you need to be seen, and maybe have some blood tests and examinations.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: OK?

transcript.speaker: PATIENT
transcript.transcript: OK, cool.

transcript.speaker: PATIENT
transcript.transcript: Thank you very much.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: All right, you take care, Ben.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: Bye now.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: Cheers.

transcript.speaker: DOCTOR
transcript.transcript: Bye.

transcript.speaker: PATIENT
transcript.transcript: Bye.
